block.p: DRISCOLL - Maureen. Entered eternal life October 27, 2000. Resident of Tarrytown, formerly of Woodside. Retired from Charles of the Ritz/Squibb Corp. Beloved sister of Daniel and Sr. Brigid, RSHM. Reposing Dwyer Funeral Home, 90 N. Broadway, Tarrytown, NY on Sunday 2-4 and 7-9PM. Mass of Christian Burial Marymount Convent, Tarrytown on Monday at 10AM. In lieu of flowers contributions to the RSHM Life Center, 3224 Beekman Ave, Sleepy Hollow, NY 10591, would be appreciated.
